attributes.action: GET EMO'S TO STOP CUTTING THEIR WRIST
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: emo's often cut their wrist and atemp 2 commit suicide which i think is a waste ov their lives and i wud lyk 2 reduce da number ov suicidal deathes by creatin dis e petition
